title: Email Warm Network (10-15 People)

instructions.task: Send personalized emails to 10-15 close friends/colleagues asking for feedback
instructions.target_recipients: Close friends, former colleagues, mentors, family who would give honest feedback
instructions.subject_line: I built something (2 min to try, would love feedback)

success_criteria.personal_touch: Each email has personal greeting and context
success_criteria.clear_ask: Specifically ask for feedback, not just to use it
success_criteria.response_tracking: Track who responds and what feedback they give

email_template_customization.greeting: Use their name and personal reference
email_template_customization.intro: Mention why you're reaching out to them specifically
email_template_customization.ask: Be clear about wanting feedback, not just promotion
email_template_customization.closing: Make it easy to say no, low pressure

follow_up_actions: Respond to all replies within 24 hours
Follow up with non-responders after 3 days (optional)
